reviews.review: This is still one of my favourite games of all time. Simply amazing

Portal 2 ist ein guter und anstrengender Puzzle-Egoshooter welcher durchaus schwer sein kann. Ich kann Portal 2 empfehlen weil es mir sehr Spaß gemacht hat, da es eine spannende Geschichte hat. Zusammen mit einem Freund kann ich den Ko-op-Modus sehr empfehlen.
9,5/10
I wish I could delete this game from my memory and play again
Bardzo fajna gierka i bardzo dużo emocji
Ótima história diálogo divertido um dos melhores jogos de puzze super recomendo
единственные два отверстия в которые я входил
топ игра но прошёл за 3 дня но интересно выполнять очивки и проходить дополнение
Co-op is better at ruining friendships than Mario Party.
G胖求求你出一下3，结局那一部分景色真的太美了
becuse i want to play whit more freinds
游戏挺好的，还可以两个人一起玩，但是第八章的方块真的让我生理不适（不知道原因，但是真的觉得恶心），整个第八章都是硬着头皮玩的。
哎，我过来了；哎，我又回去了；哎，我起飞了！
Very good game I havent played much but it is a hard puzzle game get it if you like puzzles even though its kind of old :D
A thinking man's game, or that I'm just dumb. Conveys an interesting story with minimal cut scenes
才发现我为啥还没给这个写好评？

That's a great game especially in cooperative mode. The visuals and sounds are stunning.
its an epicc sci fi portal game what do you expect
나는 이 게임을 생각합니다 역사에 남는 띵작 갓임이 분명! 이것을 외면한다면 할 것입니다 크나큰 후회와 뼈를 부수는 슬픔... 나의 뇌에 생기를 불어넣었습니다
嘿嘿，好難喔XD但好好玩呀~
Très bon jeu, avec des énigmes variées et bien pensées. A faire au moins une fois dans sa vie que ce soit pour le mode solo ou coop :) .
Проходил игру с другом в кооперативном режиме, классные головоломки для 2.
I mean... it's portal.  Everyone loves it for a reason
Oyun çok güzel kafa yormak güzel oluyor ama bir bölümde bir anda bir şey oldu ve her oyuna devam et dediğimde karşıma portal 2 yazan bir şey izletiyor açılmıyor.

Good game
Original Concept
Good Problem solving
优化很强，目测老爷机都能带动。不过有点难玩

Хоть и старенькая игра на прохождение, но интересная. Кроме основной игры, можно создавать свои уровни через мастерскую или проходить уровни, созданные вашими друзьями или даже просто другими пользователями, есть кооперативный режим для прохождения вдвоем.
Es muy entretenido y adictivo. Muy jugable aunque a veces se complica bastante. No es necesario tener un ordenador gamer potente.

Portal 2 is a great game with one of the best coop modes to play with your friends. The singleplayer campagne is brilliant and has a lot of suspends. Even if it isn't the youngest anymore, it still is a master piece. 
CG

Mira no tengo palabras, ya lo jugue en xbox y es la ostia me da pena que no haya mas pruebas para dos jugadores me encantan, la hisotoria se supera en el dos ...Me encanta, sin duda Valve sabe como hacer juegos ...creo que debe ser una d las pocas desarrolladoras que juego que sacan juego que triunfa..poco se puede decir...Bravo
Por favor sacad un dlc para añadir mas pruebas para dos jugadores ...Sois los mejores añadisteis al juego la opcion de coop que le hacia falta pero por favor hacer en un rato libre un pack de mapas o pruebas

Личная оценка - 8/10.
Игра крутая, но жаль не долгая. Сложная? - Нет, просто надо сидеть полчаса на некоторых уровнях и думать как всё-таки пройти.
Great Campaign, multiplayer great for co-op with friends
one of the best games ive ever played. do reccomend
打折时和一一起四块入的，便宜但是游戏质量极高，解密很棒，剧情也很优秀。加入催G胖数3的大军！！！
Довольно прикольно проходить такую игру вместе с другом
After finishing the single player mode, it feels really good. Also it only takes about 3-7 hours to complete!

This game is amazing, the puzzles are not too hard but really fun and the best thing about the game is the characters and their hilarious dialogues.
and tbh I thought the game would be much shorter but it's actually jam packed with really fun levels.
神作还用解释为什么喜欢吗？好玩就对了

This game is perfect, 999/10 its the best game of all time
it's cheap and also multiplayer-included so i had a lot of fun time playing it with my friends and the content is good too if u have no friends and play this alone..
Jogo muito bom e super divertido para se jogar com um amigo!
Love the game and very accessible to players of all game strengths

One of the best games ever made, source still looks great in 2020, just really fun.
